Class PausedCondition

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.MediaPlayerEventAdapter

          • uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.condition.conditions.PausedCondition
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MediaPlayerEventListener

    public class PausedCondition
extends DefaultCondition<Object>
    Implementation of a condition that waits for the media player to report that it is paused.
